# cameraDistance

**Interface Property**

The distance from the center of the map to the camera, when showing the items.

## Declaration

```swift
cameraDistance?: number;
```

## Show item options

- **animate**: A Boolean value that determines whether the map animates as the map region changes to show the items.
- **minimumSpan**: The minimum longitudinal and latitudinal span the map displays.
- **padding**: Spacing that the framework adds around the computed map region when showing items.
